PackageOracle.name: APP
PackageOracle.source: CREATE OR REPLACE PACKAGE APP AS <br/> CURRENT_USER_ID NUMBER := 0;<br/> <br/> PROCEDURE set_user(user_id NUMBER);<br/> FUNCTION get_user RETURN NUMBER;<br/>END;

body.name: APP Body
body.source: CREATE OR REPLACE PACKAGE BODY APP AS <br/> PROCEDURE set_user(user_id NUMBER) AS<br/> BEGIN<br/> CURRENT_USER_ID := user_id;<br/> END set_user;<br/><br/> FUNCTION get_user RETURN NUMBER AS<br/> BEGIN<br/> RETURN CURRENT_USER_ID;<br/> END get_user;<br/>END;
